mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn,tt.* from (select seq,id_,title,theme,view_count from community where view_count is not null order by 5 desc)tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
select * from (select rownum rn,tt.* from (select seq,id_,title,content_,theme,view_count,like_count from community order by 1 desc)tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
select id_,title,content_,theme,like_count from community where seq=#{seq}
select id_,comment_ from community_comment where seq=#{seq}
